issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI --> window properties.
3. Tap on layout/dimension properties.

h5.Actual Result:
1. You will see a pink screen with no way to go back to app.

h5.Expected Result:
1. Two rectangular views blue & white should show up.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink : Layout/dimension properties test in window properties opens a pink screen with no way to go back to app
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.2.3.201403250634
Ti SDK : 3.2.2.GA
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.1	
CLI - 3.2.3-dev
BB Z10 - 10.2.1.2.2156
Kitchensink from studio (3.2.2)

comments.body: Bad test case. A windows opens and there is no way to close it. In BlackBerry a window takes the entire screen. The dimensions on a window are ignored.
Closing issue as we no longer offer support for BlackBerry.
